SELECT emp.*, na.name as nation, dep.name as department, jl.name as jobLevel, pos.name as position FROM employee as emp left join nation as na on emp.nationId = na.id left join department as dep on emp.departmentId = dep.id left join joblevel as jl on emp.jobLevelId = jl.id left join position as pos on emp.posId = pos.id
deleted = 0
and id like concat ('%',#{searchContent}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or idCard like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%')
